data.title: Deepness Sky by Vernor Vinge, First Edition, Signed
data.meta_description: Deepness in the Sky by Vinge, Vernor and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Hardcover. Condition: Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Good. First Edition. Dust jacket in good condition. First edition, first printing. SIGNED by the author. Shelf and handling wear to cover and binding, with general signs of previous use. Binding is exposed. Minor stain on the edges. Text is clear of markings and notations. Secure packaging for safe delivery. 2.3. signed by author.

Hardcover. Condition: Near Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. Chris Moore (illustrator). 1st Edition. 1st ed/1st printing, SIGNED by the author on the title page. This book is square, solid, and unread; the boards are solid and unblemished, and the dust jacket is sharp and in a protective Brodart cover. No price clippings, no remainder marks. When you receive this book you'll feel as though you've received a postcard from the Ringworld, a snow globe from Tran-Ky-Ky, or a one-week guided tour of Trantor TRANSPORTED! NOTE: VERY light evidence of handling to the sides of the pages. Signed by Author(s).

Hardcover. Condition: Very Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Good. Bob Eggleton, dj art. (illustrator). 1st Edition 1st Printing. New York: Tor Books, 1999. 1st Edition 1st Printing. Hardcover. Very Good/Very Good. 8vo - over 7Â¾ - 9Â¾" tall. Bob Eggleton, dj art. The book has slight soiling to the edges of the page block. The dust jacket has slight wear to the covers and is unclipped ($27.95). 0 9 8 7 6 5 4 3 2 1 number line. Signed by the author on the title page.

First Edition. A DEEPNESS IN THE SKY, Tor, 1999, first edition, as new in like pictorial dust-wrapper. A prequel to the authors HUGO winning A FIRE UPON THE DEEP. This too a HUGO winning novel. SIGNED by the author.

Hardcover. Condition: Near Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Near Fine. Bob Eggleton, dj art. (illustrator). 1st Edition 1st Printing. The dust jacket is unclipped ($27.95). 0 9 8 7 6 5 4 3 2 1 number line. Signed by the author and artist on the title page.
